mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images for mobile devices to improve loading times and user experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider reducing the size of large images and scripts to improve loading speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Implement structured data (schema markup) to improve search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Ensure all interactive elements are clearly visible and accessible on smaller screens.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps required for a reservation.
tips: Consider adding more visible calls-to-action on the homepage.
Ensure that the site is fully accessible by following WCAG guidelines.
Improve content readability with better font contrast.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website provides information about ACME Hotel and allows users to book rooms online.
